sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2➛user_name➛First name,

This is to confirm that, your Trigger➛Requested Item Record➛Item➛Display namehas been successfully delivered .

We wish you have a great experience and enjoy the ride!

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2➛user_name➛Email,

Your Trigger➛Requested Item Record➛Item➛Display name is ready and is out for delivery.

The Delivery team will contact you soon.

Enjoy your drive!

For any queries please contact our customer care.

Dear 2➛user_name➛First name,

This is to confirm your request for Trigger➛Requested Item Record➛Item➛Display name.

Your request is sent for approval. Once your driver licence and aadhar details are verified, we will get back to you with the payment and delivery details!

Thank you and feel free to contact for any details/queries!

Refer this record - Trigger➛Requested Item Record

Look for the delivery date and complete the delivery on time.

For any assistance contact the sales team.

Thank you.

Please take your time out and check out  this record - Trigger➛Requested Item Record for driver licence and aadhar verification.

And provide approval as soon as possble.
